member.name: EMRPOLYPOLYLINE
member.summary: The EMRPOLYPOLYLINE and EMRPOLYPOLYGON structures contain members for the and enhanced metafile records.

member.name: EMRPOLYPOLYLINE.emr
member.summary: The base structure for all record types.

member.name: EMRPOLYPOLYLINE.rclBounds
member.summary: The bounding rectangle, in device units.

member.name: EMRPOLYPOLYLINE.cptl
member.summary: The total number of points in all polys.

member.name: EMRPOLYPOLYLINE.aPolyCounts
member.summary: An array of point counts for each poly.

member.name: EMRPOLYPOLYLINE.aptl
member.summary: An array of structures, representing the points in logical units.
